player_news.trend_summary: Dean Huijsen, currently a Bournemouth defender, has debuted for the Spanish national team, playing against his country of birth, and declared his allegiance to Spain despite Dutch heritage. Amidst transfer rumors linking him to Liverpool and Real Madrid, Huijsen has expressed a desire to potentially play for Real Madrid in the future.
